page.title: 03Industrial manufacturing 2
page.content: Lin Pac sacks are made from paper which is on a roll, each of which is tihgtly packed and wighs over a tonne. The factory makes 1000 sacks a day and 1000,000 sacks in a week.. The prints are made from rubber. They make sacks for animal feed, potatoes, flour, etc. The factory has been open for 20 years The workforce has increased from 45-120 people. Chandlers of Horncastle employs 12 people in its showroom. They sell Massey Ferguson farming equipment. They also rent out tractors and are the only retailers of this type in Horncastle. All these factories are in a small industrial estate around the A153 exit from Horncastle. The main occupation of the people in our area is farming. There are several farms in the area.
